SELECT * FROM ( SELECT SEQ , TITLE , NOTICE , CATEGORY , ORIGIN , BIZ_YEAR , CHARGE , URL , REG_DATE, SUBSTR(APPLY_START_DT, 0, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(APPLY_START_DT, 5,2) || '-' || SUBSTR(APPLY_START_DT, 7,2) APPLY_START_DT, SUBSTR(APPLY_END_DT, 0, 4) || '-' || SUBSTR(APPLY_END_DT, 5,2) || '-' || SUBSTR(APPLY_END_DT, 7,2) APPLY_END_DT, POST_START_DT , DECODE ( APPROVAL , 'Y' , '승인' , 'N' , '미승인' , '대기') AS APPROVAL , FLOOR((ROW_NUMBER()OVER(ORDER BY reg_date DESC nulls last)-1)/$list_unit$+1) AS PAGE ,

APPROVAL = #approval#
